english.segment1: Crashing, covered with debris. Dwelling in my own pity. Cry like I have not. Dig like I had not. I start to claw. Gotta get outta here. I've got to, gotta get out
english.segment2: I am, I am, I am on a higher ground. You are, You are my cure from the cycle down (2x)
english.segment3: Sinking in a sea of self. Deception never sold so well. Regret like I have not. Pain like I don't want. I start to claw. Gotta get outta here. I've got to, gotta get out
english.segment4: I am, I am, I am on a higher ground. You are, You are my cure from the cycle down (2x)
english.segment6: I'm so cold and I wonder. How'd I make it this long without You. Pull me out, out from under. On the cycle back to You
english.segment7: I am, I am, I am on a higher ground. You are, You are my cure from the cycle down (2x)
